Title: Two Sane Guys Doing Normal Things
Writer: Douglas Adams (based on the books by), Max Landis (created for television by), Andrew Black, Max Landis
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Fiona Dourif
Plot: As dark forces converge, Dirk, Todd, Farah, and Detective Estevez are forced into a final battle: save Lydia Spring, face certain death, or both.
